meanings.definition: A person who gives beauty treatments to the hands and fingernails.
meanings.sent1: The manicurists at the salon painted my nails in a lovely shade of pink.
meanings.sent2: I always feel pampered after visiting the manicurists for a manicure.
meanings.sent3: The manicurists joked that they could turn my nails into a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The skilled manicurists transformed my rough nails into polished gems.
meanings.sent5: The manicurists delicately filed my nails to perfection.

meanings.sent1: The group of manicurists gathered at the conference to discuss nail trends.
meanings.sent2: The manicurists in the salon work together to create a relaxing atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The manicurists formed a union to advocate for better working conditions.
meanings.sent4: The team of manicurists showcased their talent at the beauty expo.
meanings.sent5: The manicurists took a group photo to commemorate their successful year.
